item.title: Super noisy cars revving outside selfridges/oxford street, 12th December
item.description:
Some idiotic drives revving their cars outside for long period of times, honking, revving and making loud scary explosions noise, some don’t seem to have number plates, some are heavily decorated with Christmas lights and put on the show outside Selfridges and while parading Oxford street back and forth

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 421-429, Oxford Street, Mayfair, City of Westminster
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A Tree at the top of Margaret road has been hit. It's about to fall down., 12th December
item.description:
A Tree at the top of Margaret road has been hit. It's about to fall down. The cage surrounding it has also been damaged. Please replant and make it live again. This has been like this for almost 2 weeks now.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Lampard Grove, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bins overflowing & not being collected or used, 12th December
item.description:
Regular occurrence with these bins overflowing and then additional rubbish just being dumped in front or around them. This attract rodents and the smell is horrendous. Biggest culprit I believe is Voodoo Rays and always full of pizza and pizza boxes.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Kingsland High Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 7inch pothole, 12th December
item.description:
While driving on Crown Dale, my vehicle sustained damage when it struck a pothole that was not visible or properly marked. The impact caused my tires to burst, leaving the car unsafe to operate and resulting in unexpected repair expenses. This pothole poses a hazard not only to my vehicle but to other motorists as well. I am requesting that the issue be reviewed and that appropriate action be taken to repair the roadway and address the damages incurred as a result of this incident.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Crown Dale, Upper Norwood, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
